2025-08-01: Saint Alphonsus Liguori devoted his life to moral theology and pastoral care. Today, let us reflect on how we can offer compassionate guidance to those seeking the truth.
2025-08-02: Saint Eusebius defended the faith during the Arian controversy. Saint Peter Julian Eymard promoted devotion to the Eucharist. May we seek unity in truth.
2025-08-04: Saint John Vianney, patron of parish priests, reminds us that holiness comes from faithfulness in small things.
2025-08-06: The Transfiguration reveals Christ's divine glory. May we open our hearts to see His light in our daily lives.
2025-08-10: Saint Lawrence, a joyful martyr, teaches us that service to the poor is service to Christ.
2025-08-15: The Assumption of Mary invites us to hope in the resurrection and eternal life.
2025-08-20: Saint Bernard inspires us to seek God with both love and reason.
2025-08-22: Mary's queenship reminds us of her constant intercession for the Church.
2025-08-24: Saint Bartholomew followed Jesus faithfully, even to martyrdom. Let us be steadfast disciples.
2025-08-28: Saint Augustine's conversion shows that God's grace can transform every heart.
